description:
The class QuantumNovaIPAMLib and QuantumMelangeIPAMLib have methods 'get_global_networks' and 'get_project_networks'.
The driver QuantumNovaIPAMLib waits the admin context instead of the context for the QuantumMelangeIPAMLib.

I think, it should be the context for all IPAM drivers like other methods.
title: IPAM drivers aren't homogenous

comments.content:
The class QuantumNovaIPAMLib and QuantumMelangeIPAMLib have methods 'get_global_networks' and 'get_project_networks'.
The driver QuantumNovaIPAMLib waits the admin context instead of the context for the QuantumMelangeIPAMLib.

I think, it should be the context for all IPAM drivers like other methods.
